title: could not apply tx 113 from block 8090986: gas limit reached
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: erigon version 2.28.0-stable-355837ae

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash : 355837aee5ea2374bf420eff6e93360deb83d3f7

#### Expected behaviour

Initial sync should continue

#### Actual behaviour

stuck at:

```
WARN[10-14|07:59:38.319] [7/16 Execution] Execution failed        block=8090986 hash=0x2f8b49c5c3573f303250eb55fab3f50f00bb5882e85817bfc75da0c28be94f42 err="could not apply tx 113 from block 8090986 [0xb9974c629f64976f25235f03c909d39c9c8a97c684e1c10dfbe36e0e5dfdd194]: gas limit reached"
INFO[10-14|07:59:38.319] UnwindTo                                 block=8090985 bad_block_hash=0x2f8b49c5c3573f303250eb55fab3f50f00bb5882e85817bfc75da0c28be94f42
```

From [etherscan block 8090986](https://etherscan.io/block/8090986), this block hash `0x2f8b49...94f42` should be correct

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

run erigon to sync from scratch
